hero_main_title: Transforming Complex Ideas into Elegant Web Solutions
hero_subtitle: I specialize in building modern, high-performance web applications with a focus on clean architecture and code quality, using technologies like React and NodeJS.
about_main_title: My Approach to Building Quality Software
about_paragraph_1: With over 5 years of experience, my development philosophy centers on building efficient and scalable products with the right tools. I architect applications with a clear separation of responsibilities, creating a clean and maintainable codebase.
about_paragraph_2: I ensure data integrity with robust forms using React Hook Form and Zod, manage server state efficiently with React Query, and build accessible UIs with Radix and Tailwind CSS. This structured approach allows me to deliver secure, consistent, and high-quality solutions.
experience_subtitle: A timeline of my professional growth and key achievements

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Led the front-end development of a chatbot ecosystem, creating an intuitive UI and a dynamic admin panel that allowed the operations team to manage conversation flows without new development, reducing business response time.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Developed high-fidelity responsive interfaces and accelerated page load performance through in-depth code optimization and lazy loading, positively impacting Core Web Vitals and implementing advanced technical SEO practices.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Strengthened front-end security by implementing protections against XSS and CSRF vulnerabilities. Also eliminated critical performance bottlenecks and resolved complex caching issues to ensure data consistency.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Architected and developed critical user-facing features, including login/registration, profile management, and personalized user experiences. Built a comprehensive financial history dashboard to enhance member transparency.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Designed and led the development of an intuitive financial system interface, transforming complex data into actionable insights using charts and visualizations. Acted as the focal point for third-party API integrations.
